meanings.sent1: She procrastinated on starting her homework until late at night.
meanings.sent2: He always procrastinated on cleaning his room until it was a mess.
meanings.sent3: The cat procrastinated on chasing the mouse, deciding to nap instead.
meanings.sent4: The sun procrastinated on setting, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Procrastinated like a turtle in a race, she fell behind on her work.

meanings.sent1: They procrastinated going to the dentist for months.
meanings.sent2: The student procrastinated studying for the exam until the last minute.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel procrastinated gathering nuts, opting to play in the leaves.
meanings.sent4: Time procrastinated moving forward, stuck in a loop of repetition.
meanings.sent5: Procrastinated like a snail on a hot sidewalk, he avoided the task at hand.
